Package icyllis.arc3d.opengl

Class GLVertexArray

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.core.RefCnt
icyllis.arc3d.engine.ManagedResource
icyllis.arc3d.opengl.GLVertexArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
RefCounted
public final class GLVertexArray extends ManagedResource
This class manages the lifetime of the vertex array object and is used to track the state of the vertex array to avoid redundant GL calls. May be shared by multiple GLGraphicsPipelineState.

Supports OpenGL 3.3 and OpenGL 4.5.

    • bindIndexBuffer

      public void bindIndexBuffer(@Nonnull GLBuffer buffer)
      Set element buffer (index buffer).

      In OpenGL 3.3, bind pipeline first.

      Parameters:
      buffer - the element buffer object, raw ptr

    • bindVertexBuffer

      public void bindVertexBuffer(@Nonnull GLBuffer buffer, long offset)
      Set the buffer that stores the attribute data.

      The stride, the distance to the next vertex data, in bytes, is determined in constructor.

      In OpenGL 3.3, bind pipeline first.

      Parameters:
      buffer - the vertex buffer object, raw ptr
      offset - first vertex data to the base of the buffer, in bytes

    • bindInstanceBuffer

      public void bindInstanceBuffer(@Nonnull GLBuffer buffer, long offset)
      Set the buffer that stores the attribute data.

      The stride, the distance to the next instance data, in bytes, is determined in constructor.

      In OpenGL 3.3, bind pipeline first.

      Parameters:
      buffer - the vertex buffer object, raw ptr
      offset - first instance data to the base of the buffer, in bytes
